name: Toast Blasters
description:
Assist your brioche-buddy in traversing a hellish landscape to complete their mission!

Credits:

Alephlol - Systems, SFX, Art

Pozitronic - Mechanics, Art and Animations, SFX

Brandon Lee ( https://www.instagram.com/b.e.lee.music/ ) - Music, Game Concept

Cash Wizard - Concept Art
